knimeNode.name: Unzip files
knimeNode.shortDescription: Unzips files from a zip file

fullDescription.intro: This node unzips files from a zip file. The path and URL to the files will be contained in the output table.
fullDescription.option: Path to the output directory, where the files will be extracted to.

Specifies the behavior if a file with the same name already exists.
Overwrite
Overwrites already existing files.
Abort
Will abort if the a file already exists.

ports.outPort: Path and URL to every extracted file
